title: When Should I Use 'Heal'  as ADC
body: Hello my name is Azora and im an ADC main in, Bronze... whenever there is an all in fight early ill heal or if they dive me etc, but i dont really know the value of it. I dont know when/who to heal in a teamfight. if you could help that would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body:
Use it whenever it can acquire you an advantage such as when the enemy duo all in's you, when you are about to die to prevent the enemy from gaining an advantage, when they tower dive you, when you need a quick speed boost,

An extra chunk of health and a slight boost to movement speed offer a rather nice advantage and can sometimes determine the outcome of fights.
The value of heal is honestly exactly what you think it is, unless you think it's sustain in lane.

Heal when you need it to survive or keep one of your teammates alive.
Usually you are going to want to heal the "carries" to keep people alive, but honestly, in a teamfight, its about keeping the most "useful" person alive. Sometimes this means healing the tank so they can peel for you for a few extra seconds.

If you think someone is going to all in you (with ignite) Heal earlier so the ignite doesn't reduce the heal amount.

I personally almost never heal unless im below half health and I'm also not a fan of healing aggressively (to get the speed boost in order to catch someone).
